MailSettings.Body: ='Dear Customer,#010;#010;This is an automatic email to notify you that you have a' + IIF(Max([ARStatement.PrevEmailedCnt]) <> 0,'n updated',' '+'new') + ' '+'Statement available on your account. You will find a copy of Statement attached to this email.#010;#010;If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us at email.#010;#010;Thank you for choosing'+' '+[CompanyContact.FullName]+'.'#010;
MailSettings.Subject: ='Statement from:'+' '+IIF([ARSetup.PrepareStatements]='A',[ConsolidatedBAccount.AcctName], [BAccountNoMask.AcctName]) + IIF(Max([ARStatement.PrevEmailedCnt]) <> 0,' '+'(Updated Recently)','')

ReportVariable.Name: customerDetails
ReportVariable.ValueExpr: = IIF([BillingContact.FullName] <> NULL, [BillingContact.FullName] + '{br}', '') #010; + IIF([BillingAddress.AddressLine1] <> NULL, [BillingAddress.AddressLine1] + '{br}','')#010; + IIF([BillingAddress.AddressLine2] <> NULL, [BillingAddress.AddressLine2] + '{br}','')#010; + IIF([BillingAddress.AddressLine3] <> NULL, [BillingAddress.AddressLine3] + '{br}','')#010; + IIF([BillingAddress.City] <> NULL, [BillingAddress.City] + ' ', '')#010; + IIF([BillingAddress.State] <> NULL, [BillingAddress.State] + ' ', '')#010; + IIF([BillingAddress.PostalCode] <> NULL, [BillingAddress.PostalCode],'')#010; + IIF(#010; [BillingAddress.City] <> NULL #010; OR [BillingAddress.State] <> NULL #010; OR [BillingAddress.PostalCode] <> NULL,#010; '{br}',#010; '') #010; + IIF(#010; [BillingAddress.CountryID] <> NULL, #010; [BillingAddress.CountryID_Country_Description] + '{br}', #010; '')#010; + IIF([BillingContact.EMail] <> NULL, [BillingContact.EMail] + '{br}', '')#010; + IIF([BillingContact.Attention] <> NULL, 'Attn: ' + [BillingContact.Attention], '')

TextBox.Name: textBox214
TextBox.Value: =IIf([ConsolidatedContact.FullName]<> null, [ConsolidatedContact.FullName] + '{br}','')#010;+IIf([ConsolidatedAddress.AddressLine1]<> null, [ConsolidatedAddress.AddressLine1] + '{br}', '')#010;+IIf([ConsolidatedAddress.AddressLine2]<>null,[ConsolidatedAddress.AddressLine2] + '{br}','')#010;+IIf([ConsolidatedAddress.AddressLine3]<> null,[ConsolidatedAddress.AddressLine3] + '{br}','')#010;+IIf([ConsolidatedAddress.City]<>null, [ConsolidatedAddress.City],'')#010;+IIf([ConsolidatedAddress.City]<>null And [ConsolidatedAddress.State]<>null, ', ', '')#010;+IIf([ConsolidatedAddress.State]<>null,[ConsolidatedAddress.State],'')#010;+IIf([ConsolidatedAddress.PostalCode]<>null And [ConsolidatedAddress.State]<>null, ', ', ' ')#010;+IIf([ConsolidatedAddress.PostalCode]<>null,[ConsolidatedAddress.PostalCode],'')#010;+'{br}'#010;+IIf([ConsolidatedContact.Phone1] <>null,'Phone: ' + [ConsolidatedContact.Phone1]+ '{br}','')#010;+IIf([ConsolidatedContact.Phone3] <>null,'Fax: ' + [ConsolidatedContact.Phone3]+ '{br}','')#010;+IIF([ConsolidatedBAccount.TaxRegistrationID] <> NULL, 'Tax Registration ID: ' + [ConsolidatedBAccount.TaxRegistrationID] + '{br}', '')#010;+IIF([ConsolidatedContact.EMail] <> NULL, 'Email: ' + [ConsolidatedContact.EMail] + '{br}', '')#010;+IIf([ConsolidatedContact.WebSite]<>null,'Web: '+[ConsolidatedContact.WebSite],'')

TextBox.Name: textBox68
TextBox.Value: =IIf([OrganizationContact.FullName]<> null, [OrganizationContact.FullName] + '{br}','')#010;+IIf([OrganizationAddress.AddressLine1]<> null, [OrganizationAddress.AddressLine1] + '{br}', '')#010;+IIf([OrganizationAddress.AddressLine2]<>null,[OrganizationAddress.AddressLine2] + '{br}','')#010;+IIf([OrganizationAddress.AddressLine3]<> null,[OrganizationAddress.AddressLine3] + '{br}','')#010;+IIf([OrganizationAddress.City]<>null, [OrganizationAddress.City],'')#010;+IIf([OrganizationAddress.City]<>null And [OrganizationAddress.State]<>null, ', ', '')#010;+IIf([OrganizationAddress.State]<>null,[OrganizationAddress.State],'')#010;+IIf([OrganizationAddress.PostalCode]<>null And [OrganizationAddress.State]<>null, ', ', ' ')#010;+IIf([OrganizationAddress.PostalCode]<>null,[OrganizationAddress.PostalCode],'')#010;+'{br}'#010;+IIf([OrganizationContact.Phone1] <>null,'Phone: ' + [OrganizationContact.Phone1]+ '{br}','')#010;+IIf([OrganizationContact.Phone3] <>null,'Fax: ' + [OrganizationContact.Phone3] + '{br}','')#010;+IIF([OrganizationBAccount.TaxRegistrationID] <> NULL, 'Tax Registration ID: ' + [OrganizationBAccount.TaxRegistrationID] + '{br}', '')#010;+IIF([OrganizationContact.EMail] <> NULL, 'Email: ' + [OrganizationContact.EMail] + '{br}', '')#010;+IIf([OrganizationContact.WebSite]<>null,'Web: '+[OrganizationContact.WebSite],'')

TextBox.Name: textBox14
TextBox.Value: =IIf([CompanyContact.FullName]<> null, [CompanyContact.FullName] + '{br}','')#010;+IIf([CompanyAddress.AddressLine1]<> null, [CompanyAddress.AddressLine1] + '{br}', '')#010;+IIf([CompanyAddress.AddressLine2]<>null,[CompanyAddress.AddressLine2] + '{br}','')#010;+IIf([CompanyAddress.AddressLine3]<> null,[CompanyAddress.AddressLine3] + '{br}','')#010;+IIf([CompanyAddress.City]<>null, [CompanyAddress.City],'')#010;+IIf([CompanyAddress.City]<>null And [CompanyAddress.State]<>null, ', ', '')#010;+IIf([CompanyAddress.State]<>null,[CompanyAddress.State],'')#010;+IIf([CompanyAddress.PostalCode]<>null And [CompanyAddress.State]<>null, ', ', ' ')#010;+IIf([CompanyAddress.PostalCode]<>null,[CompanyAddress.PostalCode],'')#010;+'{br}'#010;+IIf([CompanyContact.Phone1] <>null,'Phone: ' + [CompanyContact.Phone1]+ '{br}','')#010;+IIf([CompanyContact.Phone3] <>null,'Fax: ' + [CompanyContact.Phone3] + '{br}','')#010;+IIF([BAccountNoMask.TaxRegistrationID] <> NULL, 'Tax Registration ID: ' + [BAccountNoMask.TaxRegistrationID] + '{br}', '')#010;+IIF([CompanyContact.EMail] <> NULL, 'Email: ' + [CompanyContact.EMail] + '{br}', '')#010;+IIf([CompanyContact.WebSite]<>null,'Web: '+[CompanyContact.WebSite],'')

ReportVariable.Name: totalBalanceDelta
ReportVariable.ValueExpr: = (#010; IIF(#010; ([ARStatementDetailInfo.IsInterStatementApplication] = False),#010; [ARStatementDetailInfo.SignBalanceDelta] *($totalWriteOff + $totalCashDiscount) - $totalGainLoss,#010; 0)#010; + IIF(#010; ([ARStatementDetailInfo.IsInterStatementApplication] = True) #010; OR ([ARStatementDetailInfo.IsSelfVoidingVoidApplication] = True), #010; [ARStatementDetailInfo.SignBalanceDelta] * $totalApplication, #010; 0))

ReportVariable.Name: adjustingDescription
ReportVariable.ValueExpr: = Report.ExtToUI('ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjgDocType', [ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjgDocType])#010; + ' ' #010; + [ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjgRefNbr]#010; + IIF(#010; [ARStatementDetailInfo.IsInterCurrencyApplication]#010; AND [ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjgCuryID] <> [ARStatement.CuryID], #010; ' (' + [ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjgCuryID] + ')',#010; '')#010; + IIF(#010; [ARStatementDetailInfo.IsInterCustomerApplication]#010; AND [ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjgCustomerID] <> [ARStatement.CustomerID],#010; ' (' + [ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjgCustomerID] + ')',#010; '')#010; + IIF(#010; [ARStatementDetailInfo.IsInterBranchApplication]#010; AND [ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjgBranchID] <> [ARStatement.BranchID],#010; ' by ' + [ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjgBranchID],#010; '')

ReportVariable.Name: adjustedDescription
ReportVariable.ValueExpr: = Report.ExtToUI('ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjdDocType', [ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjdDocType]) #010; + ' ' #010; + [ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjdRefNbr]#010; + IIF(#010; [ARStatementDetailInfo.IsInterCurrencyApplication]#010; AND [ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjdCuryID] <> [ARStatement.CuryID], #010; ' (' + [ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjdCuryID] + ')',#010; '')#010; + IIF(#010; [ARStatementDetailInfo.IsInterCustomerApplication]#010; AND [ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjdCustomerID] <> [ARStatement.CustomerID],#010; ' (' + [ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjdCustomerID] + ')',#010; '')#010; + IIF(#010; [ARStatementDetailInfo.IsInterBranchApplication]#010; AND [ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjdBranchID] <> [ARStatement.BranchID],#010; ' by ' + [ARStatementDetailInfo.AdjdBranchID],#010; '')

ReportVariable.Name: applicationDescription
ReportVariable.ValueExpr: = ''#010; + IIF(#010; NOT([ARStatementDetailInfo.IsInterStatementApplication]), #010; $amountDescription + ' ',#010; '')#010; + IIF(#010; ([ARStatementDetailInfo.IsInterStatementApplication] = True)#010; OR ([ARStatementDetailInfo.IsSelfVoidingVoidApplication] = True)#010; OR [ARStatementDetailInfo.IsOrphanApplication], #010; $adjustingDescription #010; + ' ' #010; + Payments.AppliedToLocalized([Customer.LocaleName]) #010; + ' ', #010; '')#010; + $adjustedDescription
